alert.note: Alert for Cape Decision to Salisbury Sound Coastal Area; Cape Fairweather to Cape Suckling Coastal Area; Dixon Entrance to Cape Decision Coastal Area; Salisbury Sound to Cape Fairweather Coastal Area (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued May 30 at 3:20AM AKDT until May 30 at 10:00AM AKDT by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM AKDT THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Visibility one quarter mile or less in dense fog. * WHERE...The outer coast from Cape Suckling to Dixon Entrance, including Yakutat, Elfin Cove, Sitka, and Craig. * WHEN...Until 10 AM AKDT this morning. * IMPACTS...Hazardous travel conditions due to low visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Marine layer clouds will back off the coast through mid morning, but remain just offshore and may move back in at times.
info.instruction: If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you.

area.areaDesc: Cape Decision to Salisbury Sound Coastal Area; Cape Fairweather to Cape Suckling Coastal Area; Dixon Entrance to Cape Decision Coastal Area; Salisbury Sound to Cape Fairweather Coastal Area
